body: Great job in figuring out how to pass data between ViewControllers.

You could let the user know that the recording failed by showing an alert message. `UIAlertController` class can be used for this purpose. Please check the documentation to learn more about `UIAlertController` -

https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/UIKit/Reference/UIAlertController_class/
Great job declaring a helper method to configure UI.
